Rule.Name: Do not use MD5
Rule.Resolution: Type {0} of member {1} is a subclass of MD5. MD5 should not be used within the SDK, as it is not FIPS compliant.

Rule.Name: Do not use HashAlgorithm.Create
Rule.Resolution: Method {0} of member {1} invokes {2}. This method should not be used within the SDK, as it may lead to MD5 use, which is not FIPS compliant.

Rule.Name: Do not store ILogger instances in static members.
Rule.Description: Checks code for static ILogger variables.
Rule.Resolution: Static member {0} of type {1} implements {2}. Instances of {2} should not be stored in static variables. Logger configuration can change during SDK use, but static references are not impacted by this.

Rule.Name: Do not use DateTime.Now or DateTime.UtcNow, use AWSSDKUtils.CorrectedNow or AWSSDKUtils.CorrectedUtcNow.
Rule.Description: Checks code for DateTime.Now or DateTime.UtcNow uses.
Rule.Resolution: Method {0} of member {1} gets {2}. This property should not be used within the SDK, and instead AWSSDKUtils.CorrectedNow or AWSSDKUtils.CorrectedUtcNow should be used.

Rule.Name: Do not use static readonly RegionEndpoint members from within the SDK.
Rule.Description: Makes sure none of the static readonly RegionEndpoint members are used directly within the SDK itself.
Rule.Resolution: Target {0} uses {1}. This member {2} be used within the SDK.{3}
